original_title: El lugar donde estuvo el paraíso
overview: In Iquitos, during the era of military dictatorships, a consul must face the arrival of a daughter he does not see in years and the stalking of a military collaborator diplomat who comes to discover his protection to a deserter pilot.

production_companies.name: Creativos Asociados de Radio y Televisión (CARTEL)

title: El lugar donde estuvo el paraíso
